library.comment: This library contains the actions for the Security Manager

variable.comment: This counter keeps track of the number of items

state-definition.comment: This is the initial state entered
This state occurs after the user has scanned the first item or pressed Start

state-definition.state-name: Wait Scale - New Item Entry Threshold

state-definition.comment: This state occurs if after CheckCustomerBag the bag is invalid
This state corresponds to SMPutBagOnScale state in app
This state is reached if there is weight on bag scale at Attract and "I brought my own bag" bttn pressed

msg-definition.comment: Generated to handle check for BackToLGW in Pickingup items state (internal)
msg-definition.msg-name: Unmatched Decrease - Check Back To LGW

msg-definition.comment: Received from FastLane - Application Control - Set Application State

msg-definition.msg-name: Clear All Exceptions No Change State
Item Validated Not Send Item OK
Only Clear Unexpected Increase Or Validate Item
Check Mismatch Or New Item Entry Threshold Violation

application-state.comment: This is VoidApproval and VoidTransApproval states
This is the Thank You state

rule.failure-transition: Wait Scale - New Item Entry Threshold

'
assign-variable
go_to_last_state
1
CheckBagBox
push-state
